dublin_core.dcvalue: Platform uses bulk text messaging containing health education, HIV prevention, service and treatment messages. Subscribers are HIV+ and are able to use a call back feature to receive further counseling on minimizing transmission and other topics.
Huai-Ming Sun, Senior Program Officer, World Education Inc., Email: hsun@worlded.org | Emmanuel Essandoh, HIV Prevention Specialist, USAID, Email: essandoh@usaid.gov
Empowering and Mobilizing People living with HIV/AIDS (EMPower II)
Client education and behavior change communication, HIV/AIDS
